Improvements.Improvement: Replace multiple null checks with Optional class
Improvements.Description: There are multiple null checks for 'remoteDAO'. Instead of using null checks, wrap the 'remoteDAO' object with Java 8's Optional, and use the methods provided by Optional to handle the case where 'remoteDAO' is null.
Since Java 7, you don't need to specify the type on both sides of the equation when creating an object. This is known as the diamond operator <>.
